title: League of Legends meets Marvel

embed.description: League of Legends X The Avengers Age of Ultron -Braum as Captain America -Xerath as Ironman -Jayce as Thor -Varus as Hawkeye -Miss fortune as Blackwidow -Dr. Mundo as Hulk -Morgana as Scarlet Witch...

body: I'm personally a fan of both franchises, just to be clear. I couldn't find any DC skin sets so I will delve deeper for that. But anyways this Marvel line-up I thought was really well done, especially Ultron Azir and Captain American Braum...those are way cool. Anyways thank Exaxuxer the Artist for this creation, and I hope you guys enjoy it XD

replies.body: As awesome as this is, Disney would sue Riot into oblivion.

*or*â€”

Simply make a boatload on royalties for using brand character themes/identities.

Riot makes a bunch of cash off of popular skins because of a popular film franchise, Disney makes *even more money than ever* by taking a cut of the profit for letting Riot use aforementioned properties.

Not to mention  is a great marketing for Disney.

At the very least Millions(which already fit in their target groups) will see the preview of the skins the day they are gonna go live on the client. They should beg and bribe Rito to make the skins.
Disney went from "the happiest place on earth" to "the place that buys your childhood"
They own ESPN as well

Not really. It depends on the level of similarity between the designs of each character. We already have a 'Hulk' Mundo with Toxic Mundo, and a 'Deadpool' Kennen with Deadly Kennen.

League can parody these characters, so long as they don't use official names of things.
I'm not so sure about {{champion:21}} as Black Widow, but I definitely like Ultron Azir.

I personally thought Katarina would have been a better choice considering both ladies fight with an almost assassin like style, but hey I think the artist wasn't thinking that and thinking more about...uh well... chest? XD
Actually I think black widows chest is more around the size of kat's as far as the movie's concerned... not that I'm looking that hard or anything  >.>
I totally wasn't looking there either...

That is more likely than not the reason.
Katarina could probably pull it off, Widow does do some close up work from time to time, and some lightning animations on Kat's knives would be a neat touch.  Or if you want to keep the range, we could give Vayne some red hair dye.
Well I assumed that Katarina would fight that close-up assassin style, but you do bring up a point about Black Widow not just being a close fighter but a ranged markswoman as well.

+1 for Vision Malzahar.

It's just too perfect a double entendre/pun hybrid.

Well, *technically*, Mundo already has a Hulk skin

Brilliant! I'd buy that Scarlet Witch Morgana in a heartbeat! 

As for Disney suing Riot. Riot already has 2 Disney inspired skins with Leblanc. 

Also, Xena and Wonder Woman inspired skins with Sivir. 

Bowser and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle inspired skins for Rammus. 

Scorpion and Sub-Zero inspired skins for Shen. 

The keyword here is "inspired". Riot doesn't make them represent the respective ips exactly.

Damn these are genius and beautiful... I think they're all awesome other than Kat seems better than MF for Black Widow and Hec seems like an odd choice... I feel like there are a couple more human (less horse) choices that would work; Ekko... Yi... Yasuo...
I think the artist was intent on the aspect of speed, and since Hecarim is...well Hecarim, I guess he went for that route.

I mean I suppose Hec is the most consistently speedy... I actually really like the idea on Ekko though because his abilities (other than his Q) kind of give the illusion of moving so fast you can't actually see it... Shrug... I like it either way... XD
